{Roots and development}

Uminers, a leading international supplier of cryptocurrency mining equipment, was founded in 2017 as an offshoot of UASIA GROUP, which began operations back in 2010. The initial request to supply miners for the Dash cryptocurrency opened up a new horizon for the company and served as the beginning for Uminers.

2017

Foundation of the company

{First steps on the world stage}

A key moment was participation in the World Digital Mining Summit (WDMS) in 2018 in Georgia, where contacts were established with leading manufacturers of mining equipment, including Bitmain and Whatsminer. This event laid the foundation for the successful development of the company.

Our mission is to make mining easier

Over the course of 7 years, we have managed to create an entire ecosystem that covers all the needs of crypto investors.

  • Reliability and transparency are the principles that we have adhered to since the first day of the company’s existence.
  • This ensured our successful entry into the markets of North America and Europe.
  • We are now actively developing cooperation with African countries.
❝

At Uminers, we have a deep belief in the potential of mining technologies and cryptocurrencies. We are driven by a desire to lead the mining industry, set new standards, offer the most innovative and appealing solutions on the market. That bullish vision inspired us from the start.

Batyr Khydyrov

Uminers Founder and CEO
